name: Camera
description:
Camera is a short and sweet fan visual-novel for Type-Moon's visual novel epic Fate/Stay Night!

I challenged myself to build a visual novel in a week or under. Besides this, I also limited myself to (up to) 5 expression sprites per character.

 I also taught myself to use akakyoryuu's 3D camera here, so expect some cool in-depth CGs, amongst other effects!

FEATURES

  • Saber!
  • Cute Sabers doing cute things
  • Rin and Shirou
  • Saber!
  • A camera!
  • Saber!

CONTENT WARNINGS

  • None!

CREDITS

GUI/Coding/Writing/Art - Mado

Music-Ontama-m

SFX-taira-komori

3D Camera Code - akakyoryuu

Characters/Setting - Type-Moon
